import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { Row, Col, Image, ListGroup, Card, Button } from 'react-bootstrap' const ProductScreen = ({ match }) => { const product = products.find((p) => p._id === match.params._id) return ( <> Go Back

{product.name}

 Price: ${product.price} Description: {product.description} Price: ${product.price} Status: {product.countInStock > 0 ? 'In Stock' : 'Out Of Stock'} ) } export default ProductScreen;
